title: Enchanting Emerald Kundan Haar Set - పచ్చ కుందన్ హారం సెట్
features: This exquisite haar features intricate Kundan setting, a traditional art form renowned for its elaborate detail and gemstone placement. The necklace is adorned with simulated emerald green stones surrounded by shimmering Kundan, creating a regal and timeless design. The matching jhumka earrings mirror the necklace's design, enhancing the overall set's allure. The necklace's design includes delicate droplet embellishments, reminiscent of traditional South Indian 'kasu mala' elements.
occasions: and traditional events like Seemantham or Half-Saree Function. Also suitable for upscale modern events where a touch of tradition is desired.
description: This Kundan Haar set embodies the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry artistry. The Hyderabadi polish lends a luxurious shine, ensuring lasting brilliance. The intricate Kundan setting and vibrant emerald green stones create a statement piece that will be treasured for generations. A true heirloom-quality set that seamlessly blends tradition and elegance.
